scripts.start: static dist -p 3001 -H "{""Access-Control-Allow-Origin"": ""*"",""Access-Control-Allow-Methods"": ""*"",""Access-Control-Allow-Headers"": ""*"", ""Cache-Control"": ""no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate"", ""Set-Cookie"": ""session=some_token_here; path=/; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Strict""}"
